original_text: “Say to Aaron and his sons: ‘These are the regulations for the sin offering: The sin offering is to be slaughtered before the Lord in the place the burnt offering is slaughtered; it is most holy.
korean_text: 아론과 그의 아들들에게 말하여 이르라 속죄제의 규례는 이러하니라 속죄제 제물은 지극히 거룩하니 여호와 앞 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 그 속죄제 제물을 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: Say to Aaron and his sons:
These are the regulations for the sin offering:
The sin offering is to be slaughtered before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 속죄 제물은 주님 앞에서 도살되어야 한다

sentences.original_text: in the place the burnt offering is slaughtered;
